2006.question: Which one of the following series of rock formations is arranged in the correct stratigraphic order (i.e. from older to younger)?
options: Malani volcanics - Panjal volcanics - Rajmahal volcanics - Deccan volcanics
2006.answer: Malani volcanics - Panjal volcanics - Rajmahal volcanics - Deccan volcanics

2010.question: Which one of the following successions represents the correct stratigraphic order from bottom to top?
options: Uttatur Group - Trichinopolly Group - Ariyalur Group - Niniyur Group
Trichinopolly Group - Uttatur Group - Ariyalur Group - Niniyur Group
Uttatur Group - Trichinopolly Group - Niniyur Group - Ariyalur Group
Niniyur Group - Trichinopolly Group - Uttatur Group - Ariyalur Group
2010.answer: Uttatur Group - Trichinopolly Group - Niniyur Group - Ariyalur Group

options: Kamiali - Nagri - Chinji - Dhokpathan - Pinjor - Tatrot
Talchir - Barakar - Pachmarhi - Bijori - Motur - Bagra

2014.question: Identify the correct chronostratigraphic sequence of the Siwalik Group from the following (oldest to youngest):
Choose the correct statement from the following:
options: Vindhyan Supergroup is devoid of limestone
The top of the Cuddapah Supergroup is Phanerozoic
Kaladgi basin is situated in the Bastar Craton
The Mesozoic Bhuj Formation consists predominantly of sandstone
2014.answer: The Mesozoic Bhuj Formation consists predominantly of sandstone

2014.question: Which combination of geological entities occurs in the same craton?
options: Chitradurga schist belt - Closepet Granite - Hutti gold mine
Bhilwara Supergroup - Sittampundi anorthosite - Zawar Pb-Zn deposit
Kolar schist belt - Malani rhyolite - Malanjkhand copper deposit
Mansar Formation - Makrana marble - Sukinda chromite deposit
2014.answer: Chitradurga schist belt - Closepet Granite - Hutti gold mine

2018.question: The correct combination(s) of ranks and corresponding categories of stratigraphic units is/are:
The correct chronological sequence (older to younger) of the Precambrian stratigraphic units listed below is:
options: Sargur Group, Chitradurga Group, Alwar Group, Kaimur Group
Chitradurga Group, Sargur Group, Kaimur Group, Alwar Group
Sargur Group, Alwar Group, Chitradurga Group, Kaimur Group
Sargur Group, Chitradurga Group, Kaimur Group, Alwar Group
2018.answer: Sargur Group, Chitradurga Group, Kaimur Group, Alwar Group
